references.paper_title: Estimation of the causal effects of time-varying exposures
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of causal inference and provides the theoretical framework for estimating causal effects in the presence of time-varying confounders, which is directly relevant to the paper's approach.

references.paper_title: Estimating counterfactual treatment outcomes over time through adversarially balanced representations
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of adversarially balanced representations for estimating counterfactual treatment effects over time, a technique directly relevant to and compared against in the current work.

references.paper_title: Forecasting treatment responses over time using recurrent marginal structural networks
references.reason: This paper proposes recurrent marginal structural networks (RMSNs) for estimating treatment effects over time, which is a crucial baseline model for the current research and extensively compared against.

references.paper_title: Causal Transformer for estimating counterfactual outcomes
references.reason: This paper introduces Causal Transformer, a state-of-the-art model that uses transformers for counterfactual regression over time, directly compared and contrasted with the current method.

references.paper_title: Representation learning with contrastive predictive coding
references.reason: This paper introduces contrastive predictive coding (CPC), a self-supervised learning technique that is a core component of the proposed methodology and a key contribution to the presented work.
